        CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS: The characters "DXrdDh" MUST be prominently and clearly visible in the image while appearing naturally integrated. These characters should be:

        - Integrated naturally into the scene (e.g. as signage, displays, markings, or other contextually appropriate elements)
        - Should look like they belong in the scene, not artificially overlaid

        The integration should maintain visual coherence with the scene while ensuring "DXrdDh" remains clearly visible.

        Generate the image at 336x336 resolution with an aspect ratio of 1.0 (width:height).

        Remember: The absolute clarity and visibility of "DXrdDh" is essential - it should be easily noticeable in the image while still appearing as part of the scene. NO other text or numbers should be visible anywhere in the image.
